mapper.select: select project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, arg_seq, simple_arg_type, arg_type, simple_class_name, full_method from lv_invoke_method_arg_type where method_hash = #{methodHash}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_method_arg_type(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, simple_arg_type, arg_type, simple_class_name, full_method) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{simpleArgType}, #{argType}, #{simpleClassName}, #{fullMethod})

insert into lv_invoke_method_arg_type(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, simple_arg_type, arg_type, simple_class_name, full_method) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.simpleArgType}, #{entity.argType}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.fullMethod})

insert into lv_invoke_method_arg_type(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, simple_arg_type, arg_type, simple_class_name, full_method) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.simpleArgType}, #{entity.argType}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.fullMethod})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), simple_arg_type = values(simple_arg_type), arg_type = values(arg_type), simple_class_name = values(simple_class_name), full_method = values(full_method)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_method_arg_type
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
simple_arg_type = #{simpleArgType},
arg_type = #{argType},
simple_class_name = #{simpleClassName},
full_method = #{fullMethod},
where method_hash = #{methodHash}
